summary: When anxious Missy's abusive husband Alan eats some bad fish tacos, her and her sister Emily embark on a road trip to dump his body in the desert. Along the way the sisters work on ... See full summary »
cast: Marley Shelton|Samantha Shelton|Misha Collins|Mark Pellegrino|Leslie Jordan|Alexandra Holden|Heidi Swedberg|Robert Thompson|Kirk Ward|Kristina Haddad
title: Moving Alan
